resources.string: Would you like to visit the Recycle App website for additional information?

Due to Android\'s aggressive battery optimisations, notification reminders might not work on your device.\n\n Would you like disable the battery optimisations for this app to make sure the reminders are allowed to trigger?

Android will try to extend its battery life by letting the system go to sleep. This mode is called \'Doze\' and might prevent the apps from acting when necessary such as in the case of firing a reminder notification.\n\n To disable this, Becycle needs to be whitelisted by disabling battery optimizations. This will allow the app to send reminders even when the system is in Doze mode.

Due to constraints set by the Android operating system for the power-saving \'Doze\' mode, we are only able to check whether a notification should be triggered every 15 minutes. This also implies that there is a 15 minute error margin window for the notification time you have selected.\n\n
Should your notification reminder be set to 09:00, the latest you can expect your notification to be triggered is 09:15 (worst case).

Collection is offered exceptionally in lieu of the one which normally took place on %1$s.

Dear User,


Becycle was a pet project created from an effort to streamline and facilitate garbage collection services, and make life easier for both end users as the collective powers currently offering these services.

 A part of this vision was also decentralization, granting individuals more insight and ownership of the processes involved. Sadly, the latter part doesn't correspond with the current vision of the involved organisations, and through informal communication an agreement was reached to halt the project to prevent further escalation. 


Pushing the project onwards could either be perceived as a hostile action against the organisations in charge, and/or the operational aspects of keeping this project running would become hugely resource-intensive, far beyond the time & money I intended to invest in it.


If there are certain features and/or aspects of this app you've enjoyed and would like to see in other garbage collection apps, I would strongly advise you to contact their support department and make a feature request. I'm going to release the codebase for this app as open-source, allowing any-and-all other parties to freely make use of what was offered in Becycle.


As a small project, I would like to thank all of you for the trust and kind words you have shared with me, and I hope you will find a suitable alternative soon!


Kind regards,
 Bojan Belic
 Sigma Delta Software Solutions
